description: Unique identifier for the note record (primary key).
System-generated date and time when the note was created or last updated; confirm with SME.
Display/work order number this note pertains to (human-facing identifier).
Metadata indicating how the work order relationship is resolved (reference field name); likely legacy; confirm with SME.
Internal work order ID from the maintenance system linked to this note; differs from display number; confirm with SME.
Metadata indicating the relation target for the internal work order ID; likely a reference field name; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the equipment/unit associated with the note or its work order.
Metadata indicating how the equipment relationship is resolved (reference field name); likely legacy; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the employee who entered the note; 0 may indicate system or unknown.
Metadata indicating how the employee relationship is resolved (reference field name); likely legacy; confirm with SME.
Free-text details describing issues, observations, or instructions related to the work order or equipment.
Clock time when the note was recorded; often stored separately from date.
Calendar date when the note was recorded.
Key value for this note in a legacy source system, used for migration or back-reference.
Name of the legacy source table from which the legacy key originated.
